title: GPU LLM Orchestrator
objective: Serve quantized GGUF model locally with GPU assist
stack: JetPack 5.1.2; llama.cpp CUDA build; tegrastats; systemd
workflow: Flash JetPack image > run tools/orin_bootstrap.sh > deploy llama.cpp service > stream tegrastats to broker
verification: Token latency under 120ms; GPU temp under 65C

title: Telemetry Relay Node
objective: Publish tegrastats metrics and fan guidance to broker
workflow: Enable tegrastats loop > parse load and thermals > publish JSON to infinity.mqtt > throttle fan PWM when hot
verification: Telemetry interval 1s; fan stays below 70 percent duty

title: Edge Sensor Hub
objective: Bridge SPI display and environmental sensors to broker
stack: Raspberry Pi OS 64-bit; pigpio; SPI display driver; wifi
workflow: Run bootstrap_pi.sh > bind SPI display > stream sensor readings > mirror display events to Jetson
verification: Sensor jitter under 5 percent; display updates under 120ms

title: Image Builder Agent
objective: Assemble reproducible Pi images for cluster
stack: Raspberry Pi OS base; pi-gen; ansible; rsync
workflow: Pull manifests > render pi-gen config > bake image > sign manifest with Breath tick
verification: Image hash stored; manifest published to broker

title: Realtime IO Bridge
objective: Translate actuator and sensor signals for higher-level agents
stack: Arduino firmware; RS485 shield; FreeRTOS task loop
workflow: Compile firmware with codex profile > expose command queue over serial > debounce sensor inputs > publish heartbeat

title: Field Diagnostics Probe
objective: Provide quick validation routine for field hardware
stack: Arduino firmware; OLED display; diagnostic harness
workflow: Load diag firmware > step through IO tests > render pass or fail on OLED > emit summary packet
verification: All test steps logged; failure codes surfaced
